resources.string: In order to track your location consistently, this app needs to be set to \'Not Optimized\' for battery optimization.

- Click OK to open battery optimization settings.
- Tap 'Not Optimized' and change it to 'All Apps'.
- Find this app under 'All Apps'.
- Set it to 'Not Optimized'.
- Reopen the app.
This app is currently tracking your location
In order to schedule location tracking during your work hours, this app needs to be allowed to set alarms and reminders.
For best results, please "Always Allow" Microsoft Dynamics 365 Field Service to track your location. This will enable the app to work while you are on-site.
We will collect your location history to track address, latitude, and longitude only during working hours and days set by your organization.
